trans-unit.source: Associates cancellation logic, in the form of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />, with a main path of execution, also expressed as a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Asocia la lógica de cancelación, en forma de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />, con una ruta principal de ejecución, también expresada como un objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> contained by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> that represents the main path of execution.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> contenido por el <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> que representa la ruta principal de ejecución.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> that is executed in the event of cancellation.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> que se ejecuta en caso de cancelación.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> asociada a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: La colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> asociada a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
